creator: CookApps
descriptionHtml:
Play the easy-to-grow IDLE Berserker: Action RPG in the palm of your hands!
The swordsman wondering around Gasgaia was on the verge of death due to a critical injury, but miraculously survives because of a girl who appears out of nowhere.
However, when he realizes that the girl who saved him was taken as sacrifice to the Black Dragon Trakan, he signs a contract with the Reaper and is reborn as a berserker full with rage.

■Spectacular combat action
Feel the power of the berserker that amplifies in rage!

■Infinitely growth RPG
Grow infinitely to defeat the Black Dragon Trakan.

■Easy gameplay
Anyone can easily enjoy the game. The game is simple yet packed with splendid action!

■Rich collection
Obtain and upgrade tons of amazing equipments and skills!

■Breathtaking game contents
Enjoy various contents such as auto battle, dungeon, summon, quest, and hero growth!

■Unique costumes
Equip unique costumes and diversify your berserker concepts!
descriptionShort: Spectacular and exciting action that you’ve never seen in Idle RPG games!

container.value: 8th floor, U space building, 670, Sampyeong-dong, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea

creator: CookApps
descriptionHtml:
Play the easy-to-grow IDLE Berserker: Action RPG in the palm of your hands!
The swordsman wondering around Gasgaia was on the verge of death due to a critical injury, but miraculously survives because of a girl who appears out of nowhere.
However, when he realizes that the girl who saved him was taken as sacrifice to the Black Dragon Trakan, he signs a contract with the Reaper and is reborn as a berserker full with rage.

■Spectacular combat action
Feel the power of the berserker that amplifies in rage!

■Infinitely growth RPG
Grow infinitely to defeat the Black Dragon Trakan.

■Easy gameplay
Anyone can easily enjoy the game. The game is simple yet packed with splendid action!

■Rich collection
Obtain and upgrade tons of amazing equipments and skills!

■Breathtaking game contents
Enjoy various contents such as auto battle, dungeon, summon, quest, and hero growth!

■Unique costumes
Equip unique costumes and diversify your berserker concepts!

The swordsman wondering around Gasgaia was on the verge of death due to a critical injury, but miraculously survives because of a girl who appears out of nowhere.

However, when he realizes that the girl who saved him was taken as sacrifice to the Black Dragon Trakan, he signs a contract with the Reaper and is reborn as a berserker full with rage.

■Spectacular combat action
Feel the power of the berserker that amplifies in rage!

■Infinite growth RPG
Grow infinitely to defeat the Black Dragon Trakan.

■Easy gameplay
Anyone can easily enjoy the game. The game is simple yet packed with splendid action!

■Rich collection
Obtain and upgrade tons of amazing equipments and skills!

■Breathtaking game contents
Enjoy various contents such as auto battle, dungeon, summon, quest, and hero growth!

■Unique costumes
Equip unique costumes and diversify your berserker concepts!

App Permissions
[Optional Permissions]
- READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
- CAMERA
: required storage access permission to save game data


[How to revoke access] ▸ Android 6.0 or higher: Settings > Applications > Permissions > Permissions list > Revocation settings ▸ Under Android 6.0: Upgrade the operating system to revoke access or delete the application ※ If you are using an Android version less than 6.0 Since you cannot individually set optional access rights, it is recommended to update to version 6.0 or later.

title: IDLE Berserker X Doom Breaker

container.value: 8th floor, U space building, 670, Sampyeong-dong, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea

creator: CookApps
descriptionHtml:
IDLE BERSERKER x DOOM BREAKER! Breathtaking battles with various collab characters! Extreme action collaboration starts now!

Play the easy-to-grow IDLE Berserker: Action RPG in the palm of your hand!

The swordsman wandering around Gasgaia was on the verge of death due to a critical injury but miraculously survives because of a girl who appears out of nowhere.

However, when he realizes that the girl who saved him was taken as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon Trakan, he signs a contract with the Reaper and is reborn as a berserker full of rage.

■Spectacular combat action
Feel the power of the berserker that amplifies in rage!

■Infinite growth RPG
Grow infinitely to defeat the Black Dragon Trakan.

■Easy gameplay
Anyone can easily enjoy the game. The game is simple yet packed with splendid action!

■Rich collection
Obtain and upgrade tons of amazing equipment and skills!

■Breathtaking game contents
Enjoy various contents such as auto battle, dungeon, summon, quest, and hero growth!

■Unique costumes
Equip unique costumes and diversify your berserker concepts!

creator: CookApps
descriptionHtml:
[Baki Hanma X Idle Berserker] Collaboration of the Century Season 2

Download now and earn collaboration season 2 rewards!
CODE : BERSERKERXBAKI

Experience the thrill of the easy-to-advance IDLE RPG game - IDLE Berserker: A palm-sized Action RPG!

Amid the lands of Gasgaia, a wandering swordsman faced near death from a grievous injury, only to be miraculously saved by a mysterious girl. But when he discovers that his savior has been taken as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon Trakan, he strikes a deal with the Reaper and is reborn into the world of idle RPG games as a rage-fueled berserker.

■Experience the Spectacular Combat
Feel the raw doom and power of a berserker as he amplifies in rage in this RPG setting!

■Infinite Growth RPG Elements
Dive deep into the infinite growth mechanics to defeat the Black Dragon Trakan in one of the most engaging RPG games.

■Accessible Gameplay
This IDLE RPG game is designed for everyone. Simple mechanics, but full of dazzling action – truly an idle adventure!

■Diverse Collection
In this idle RPG, gather and level up a plethora of incredible equipment and skills!

■Captivating Game Features
Revel in a wealth of content such as auto-battle, dungeons, summons, quests, and the pivotal hero growth mechanics in this RPG!

■Dress in Style
Adorn your berserker in unique costumes that not only diversify concepts but also enhance your idle RPG experience!

descriptionHtml:
★Sweet Home X IDLE Berserker Collaboration Season 2★

Season 2 of Sweet Home collaboration event starts! Check out the new exclusive costumes, companions, and creatures.

The new Login Event is up and & running! Get Diamonds, Dungeon keys, Summon tokens, and SSR collaboration costumes for FREE! Meet the Sweet Home characters and grab Hyun Cha, Hyuk Lee, and Wook Pyeon collaboration costumes!

A world where desire turns monstrous… In the Green Home, I fought against all odds to save what is left of the human race… Waking up after losing consciousness, I feel that something is wrong. Something terrible happened to me… What in the world is going on? Where am I? Can I survive in this place filled with monsters more terrifying than Green Home?

To Idle or Not to Idle, That is the Question! Sweet Home comes to life in the intense and colorful action RPG, IDLE Berserker!

Experience the thrill of the easy-to-advance IDLE RPG game - IDLE Berserker: A palm-sized Action RPG!

Amid the lands of Gasgaia, a wandering swordsman faced near death from a grievous injury, only to be miraculously saved by a mysterious girl. But when he discovers that his savior has been taken as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon Trakan, he strikes a deal with the Reaper and is reborn into the world of idle RPG games as a rage-fueled berserker.

■Experience the Spectacular Combat
Feel the raw doom and power of a berserker as he amplifies in rage in this RPG setting!

■Infinite Growth RPG Elements
Dive deep into the infinite growth mechanics to defeat the Black Dragon Trakan in one of the most engaging RPG games.

■Accessible Gameplay
This IDLE RPG game is designed for everyone. Simple mechanics, but full of dazzling action – truly an idle adventure!

■Diverse Collection
In this idle RPG, gather and level up a plethora of incredible equipment and skills!

■Captivating Game Features
Revel in a wealth of content such as auto-battle, dungeons, summons, quests, and the pivotal hero growth mechanics in this RPG!

■Dress in Style
Adorn your berserker in unique costumes that not only diversify concepts but also enhance your idle RPG experience!

- READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
